docs.text: Primary Secondary Success Danger Dark Outlined - Primary Outlined - Secondary Outlined - Success Outlined - Danger Outlined - Dark Text - Primary Text - Secondary Text - Success Text - Danger Text - Dark Unelevated - Primary Unelevated - Secondary Unelevated - Success Unelevated - Danger Unelevated - Dark <button class="primary">Primary</button> <button class="secondary">Secondary</button> <button class="success">Success</button> <button class="danger">Danger</button> <button class="dark">Dark</button> <button class="outlined primary">Outlined - Primary</button> <button class="outlined secondary">Outlined - Secondary</button> <button class="outlined success">Outlined - Success</button> <button class="outlined danger">Outlined - Danger</button> <button class="outlined dark">Outlined - Dark</button> <button class="text primary">Text - Primary</button> <button class="text secondary">Text - Secondary</button> <button class="text success">Text - Success</button> <button class="text danger">Text - Danger</button> <button class="text dark">Text - Dark</button> <button class="unelevated primary">Unelevated - Primary</button> <button class="unelevated secondary">Unelevated - Secondary</button> <button class="unelevated success">Unelevated - Success</button> <button class="unelevated danger">Unelevated - Danger</button> <button class="unelevated dark">Unelevated - Dark</button>

docs.text:
Installing localy If you want to install locally, simply click the button below. Download The zip file you downloaded contains these files: dist/ src/ > Note that jQuery and Material icons must be imported before importing the library files. See below how to import them using a CDN. > The Roboto font is automatically imported by Google fonts CDN service. Installing from a CDN if you want to use a CDN, see below. Material icons jQuery Tronic247 Material Starter template A Basic HTML5 Template

docs.title: Getting started

docs.text: If you want to install locally, simply click the button below. Download The zip file you downloaded contains these files: dist/ <Compiled files> src/ <Source files> > Note that jQuery and Material icons must be imported before importing the library files. See below how to import them using a CDN. > The Roboto font is automatically imported by Google fonts CDN service.
